scripts.prerender-static: cross-env NODE_ENV=production WITH_WIDGETS=true SERVER_URI='https://packhouse.ru' webpack --config prerender-static.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.prerender-catalog: cross-env URL_CODE='catalog' NODE_ENV=production WITH_WIDGETS=true SERVER_URI='https://packhouse.ru' webpack --config prerender-catalog.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.prerender-products: cross-env URL_CODE='products' NODE_ENV=production WITH_WIDGETS=true SERVER_URI='https://packhouse.ru' webpack --config prerender-catalog.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.prerender-reset: cross-env URL_CODE='reset' NODE_ENV=production SERVER_URI='https://packhouse.ru' webpack --config prerender-catalog.js --progress --hide-modules
